title._content: [Unidentified African American soldier in Union uniform and gloves with musket; another soldier waits at the side] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified African American soldier in Union uniform and gloves with musket; another soldier waits at the side] [between 1863 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.3 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Leather oval interior with scroll. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Subjects: United States.--Army--People--1860-1870. African Americans--Military service--1860-1870.
